text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-4-1/" title="1 Chronicles 4:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-2/" title="1 Chronicles 4:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 And Reaiah the son of Shobal begat Jahath; and Jahath begat Ahumai, and Lahad. These *are* the families of the Zorathites.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-3/" title="1 Chronicles 4:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And these *were of* the father of Etam; Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash: and the name of their sister *was* Hazelelponi:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-4/" title="1 Chronicles 4:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And Penuel the father of Gedor, and Ezer the father of Hushah. These *are* the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah, the father of Bethlehem.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-5/" title="1 Chronicles 4:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And Ashur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-6/" title="1 Chronicles 4:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And Naarah bare him Ahuzam, and Hepher, and Temeni, and Haahashtari. These *were* the sons of Naarah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-7/" title="1 Chronicles 4:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 And the sons of Helah *were*, Zereth, and Jezoar, and Ethnan.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-8/" title="1 Chronicles 4:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 And Coz begat Anub, and Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-9/" title="1 Chronicles 4:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 And Jabez was more honourable than his brethren: and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I bare him with sorrow.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-10/" title="1 Chronicles 4:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep *me* from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-11/" title="1 Chronicles 4:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 And Chelub the brother of Shuah begat Mehir, which *was* the father of Eshton.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-12/" title="1 Chronicles 4:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And Eshton begat Bethrapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Irnahash. These *are* the men of Rechah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-13/" title="1 Chronicles 4:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-14/" title="1 Chronicles 4:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 And Meonothai begat Ophrah: and Seraiah begat Joab, the father of the valley of Charashim; for they were craftsmen.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-15/" title="1 Chronicles 4:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh; Iru, Elah, and Naam: and the sons of Elah, even Kenaz.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-16/" title="1 Chronicles 4:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-17/" title="1 Chronicles 4:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 And the sons of Ezra *were*, Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon: and she bare Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-18/" title="1 Chronicles 4:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 And his wife Jehudijah bare Jered the father of Gedor, and Heber the father of Socho, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah. And these *are* the sons of Bithiah the daughter of Pharaoh, which Mered took.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-19/" title="1 Chronicles 4:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 And the sons of *his* wife Hodiah the sister of Naham, the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-20/" title="1 Chronicles 4:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 And the sons of Shimon *were*, Amnon, and Rinnah, Benhanan, and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi *were*, Zoheth, and Benzoheth.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-21/" title="1 Chronicles 4:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 The sons of Shelah the son of Judah *were*, Er the father of Lecah, and Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of them that wrought fine linen, of the house of Ashbea,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-22/" title="1 Chronicles 4:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 And Jokim, and the men of Chozeba, and Joash, and Saraph, who had the dominion in Moab, and Jashubilehem. And *these are* ancient things.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-23/" title="1 Chronicles 4:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 These *were* the potters, and those that dwelt among plants and hedges: there they dwelt with the king for his work.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-24/" title="1 Chronicles 4:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 The sons of Simeon *were*, Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, *and* Shaul:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-25/" title="1 Chronicles 4:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-26/" title="1 Chronicles 4:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-27/" title="1 Chronicles 4:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters; but his brethren had not many children, neither did all their family multiply, like to the children of Judah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-28/" title="1 Chronicles 4:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 And they dwelt at Beersheba, and Moladah, and Hazarshual,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-29/" title="1 Chronicles 4:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 And at Bilhah, and at Ezem, and at Tolad,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-30/" title="1 Chronicles 4:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30 And at Bethuel, and at Hormah, and at Ziklag,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-31/" title="1 Chronicles 4:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31 And at Bethmarcaboth, and Hazarsusim, and at Bethbirei, and at Shaaraim. These *were* their cities unto the reign of David.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-32/" title="1 Chronicles 4:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32 And their villages *were*, Etam, and Ain, Rimmon, and Tochen, and Ashan, five cities:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-33/" title="1 Chronicles 4:33 KJV verse detail"><span id="35" class="versehover">33 And all their villages that *were* round about the same cities, unto Baal. These *were* their habitations, and their genealogy.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-34/" title="1 Chronicles 4:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34 And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah the son of Amaziah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-35/" title="1 Chronicles 4:35 KJV verse detail"><span id="37" class="versehover">35 And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-36/" title="1 Chronicles 4:36 KJV verse detail"><span id="38" class="versehover">36 And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-37/" title="1 Chronicles 4:37 KJV verse detail"><span id="39" class="versehover">37 And Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah;

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-38/" title="1 Chronicles 4:38 KJV verse detail"><span id="40" class="versehover">38 These mentioned by *their* names *were* princes in their families: and the house of their fathers increased greatly.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-39/" title="1 Chronicles 4:39 KJV verse detail"><span id="41" class="versehover">39 And they went to the entrance of Gedor, *even* unto the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-40/" title="1 Chronicles 4:40 KJV verse detail"><span id="42" class="versehover">40 And they found fat pasture and good, and the land *was* wide, and quiet, and peaceable; for *they* of Ham had dwelt there of old.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-41/" title="1 Chronicles 4:41 KJV verse detail"><span id="43" class="versehover">41 And these written by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smote their tents, and the habitations that were found there, and destroyed them utterly unto this day, and dwelt in their rooms: because *there was* pasture there for their flocks.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-42/" title="1 Chronicles 4:42 KJV verse detail"><span id="44" class="versehover">42 And *some* of them, *even* of the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-4-43/" title="1 Chronicles 4:43 KJV verse detail"><span id="45" class="versehover">43 And they smote the rest of the Amalekites that were escaped, and dwelt there unto this day.
